iti111:0.3: The Chapter on the Holy Offering of the Teaching
iti111:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti111:2.1: “Mendicants, live by the ethical precepts and the monastic code. Live restrained in the code of conduct, conducting yourselves well and seeking alms in suitable places. Seeing danger in the slightest fault, keep the rules you’ve undertaken.
